title: ✿ UPDATED Lakeview 1 bedroom - granite / stainless - central air
posting_body: ['SEE VIDEO (copy and paste the YouTube link into your browser):  https://youtu.be/A3SIAxxSoTQ', '3708 N. Sheffield, 2nd floor', 'Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment for rent in Lakeview!', ' This is a 2nd floor unit in a walk-up building on Sheffield at Waveland.', ' Across the street from Wrigley Field, 1.5 blocks from the Addison red line station and 2.5 blocks from the Sheridan red line station.', 'Available September 1st', 'Hardwood floors', 'Granite / stainless steel kitchen', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Queen sized bedroom', 'Good closet space', 'Central air and gas heat (paid by tenant)', 'Tenants pay for gas, electric, and a $20/month utility fee for water/trash/sewer', 'Shared coin-operated laundry in the building', 'Street parking only', 'Cats are welcome with a $100 pet registration fee (per pet) and $25/month pet rent (per pet) - sorry, no dogs', 'Living room 13\'10" x 12\'6"', 'Kitchen/dining area 14\'6" x 10\'', 'Bedroom 10\'1" x 12\'', 'Bathroom 6\'9" x 4\'9"', '$350 non-refundable move-in fee per adult tenant (no security deposit)', 'No application fee', 'To see, call or email', 'Heidi Sonnenberg', 'The Square One Team', 'Applications are taken on a first come, first serve basis.', 'To rent this apartment, the following are due up front:', "1)  First month's rent", '2)  Move-in fee(s) and pet fee(s)']
